content: प्रकरः {@--1@} A heap, multitude, quantity, collection; मुक्ताफलप्रकरभांजि गुहागृहाणि <ls>Śi. 5. 12</ls>; बाष्पप्रकरकलुषां दृष्टिं <ls>Ś. 6. 8</ls>; <ls>R. 9. 56</ls>; <ls>Ku. 5. 68.</ls> {@--2@} A nosegay, bunch of flowers. {@--3@} Aid, assistance, friendship. {@--4@} Usage, practice. {@--5@} Respect. {@--6@} Seduction, abduction. --रं Aloewood.
